thought: To craft a netherite_ingot, I need to have 4 gold_ingots. The only gold ore I have is nether_gold_ore which I can smelt into gold_ingot. Therefore I will smelt one of my nether_gold_ores into an empty slot (eg., 11)
Ok
act: smelt from slot 39 to slot 11 with quantity 1
